scripts.setup-project: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:dummy && npm install
scripts.clean-project: npm run clean:root && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:dummy
scripts.check-project: npm run setup-project && run-s prettier-write lint-project build-project test-project
scripts.clean-check: npm run clean-project && npm run check-project
scripts.deploy-project: npm run setup-project && run-s build-project deploy:*
scripts.demo-project: npm run deploy-project && cd deploy && node index.js
scripts.dev-project: npm run setup-project && npm run ds
scripts.clean:root: rm -rf deploy && rm -rf node_modules || npm run winclean:deploy
scripts.clean:backend: rm -rf backend/build && rm -rf backend/node_modules || npm run winclean:backend
scripts.clean:dummy: rm -rf dummy/build && rm -rf dummy/node_modules || npm run winclean:dummy
scripts.clean:frontend: rm -rf frontend/build && rm -rf frontend/node_modules || npm run winclean:frontend
scripts.cypress-ci: npm run ds >/dev/null & wait-on --timeout 30000 http://127.0.0.1:3000 http://127.0.0.1:3030/mirror && npm run cypress
